sentences.en: For urban areas this approach was wholly inadequate.
sentences.cn: 对于市区来说，这种办法根本不会奏效。

sentences.en: Funding of education had been grossly inadequate for years.
sentences.cn: 教育资金多年来极为匮乏。

sentences.en: His wages were pitifully inadequate for the needs of his growing family.
sentences.cn: 他的工资少得可怜,不够养活不断添丁增口的家庭.

sentences.en: I still feel inadequate, useless and mixed up.
sentences.cn: 我仍然感到自己能力不够，毫无用处，整个儿一团糟。

sentences.en: In court filings, they argued that the settlement was inadequate.
sentences.cn: 在法庭讼案中，他们提出和解费数额太少。

sentences.en: Many illnesses are the re - sult of inadequate sanita - tion.
sentences.cn: 许多疾病都来源于不健全的卫生设施.

sentences.en: Mary Ann felt painfully inadequate in the crisis.
sentences.cn: 意识到自己在这场危机中无能为力，玛丽·安感到很痛苦。

sentences.en: Persistent damage or inadequate healing may lead to chronic lameness.
sentences.cn: 反复受伤或治疗不当可导致长期跛足。

sentences.en: Public expenditure on the arts is woefully inadequate.
sentences.cn: 艺术方面的公共支出严重不足。

sentences.en: Regrettably we have to house families in these inadequate flats.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我们不得不让住户挤在这些狭小的公寓里。

sentences.en: She was left feeling inept and inadequate.
sentences.cn: 她被弄得感到笨拙无能。

sentences.en: Some shops gave wrong or inadequate advice when dispensing homeopathic medicines.
sentences.cn: 有些药店在配发顺势疗法的药物时给出了错误或不当的建议。

sentences.en: The commission pinpoints inadequate housing as a basic problem threatening village life.
sentences.cn: 该委员会明确指出住房不足是威胁村民生活的根本问题。

sentences.en: The crash was a direct result of inadequate navigational aids.
sentences.cn: 坠机是导航不力的直接后果。

sentences.en: The new air conditioning system proved inadequate.
The project could fail if there is inadequate follow-through.
sentences.cn: 如果缺少恰当的后续行动，该项目可能失败。

words.tran_cn: 不适当，不充分；不完全；不十分

trans.tran_cn: 不充足的，不适当的，不足胜任的，信心不足的
trans.tran_en: not good enough, big enough, skilled enough etc for a particular purpose
